description._content: ID: D40005-32 Title: The Political drama. [A series of caricatures.] Illustrator: "Grant, Charles Jameson (Charles Jameson Grant)" Provenance: [London] : Printed and published by G. Drake, 12, Houghton Street, Clare Market, [1834-1835.] Caption: 'John Bull; or, an Englishman's fireside!' In a room an emaciated John Bull is sitting on a chair, shivering; a policeman is outside the window. The subject is the the proposed, ‘Sabbath Bill’, which was set to drastically control activities on the Sabbath. Source identifier: HS.74/1630 no.4 British Library Shelfmark: HS.74/1630 If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of this image, please place an order at Images Online imagesonline.bl.uk. The details from the above list should help you locate the images.
